channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Picking stocks is a losing bet, this market legend says. Here’s his winning strategy.
item.description: ‘The market knows more than you,’ DFA’s David Booth points out. And he never forgets it.

item.title: 15 stocks of companies set to grow sales twice as fast as the S&P 500 — analysts love them
item.description: Stocks passing this screen have 12-month upside potential of up to 33% as implied by consensus price targets.

item.title: Intel’s upcoming earnings have this analyst wondering if the numbers actually matter

item.title: Buy these stocks as railroad-merger talk heats up, analyst says
item.description: CSX’s stock has been upgraded at TD Cowen, which sees the railroad operating benefiting from consolidation in the rail sector.

item.title: MIT’s 3-in-1 training tool eases robot learning

item.title: Chinese startup Manus challenges ChatGPT in data visualization: which should enterprises use?
item.description: While Manus handles messy data better than ChatGPT, neither tool is yet ready for boardroom-ready slides.

item.title: A ChatGPT ‘router’ that automatically selects the right OpenAI model for your job appears imminent
item.description: Like going to the supermarket and staring at aisles of cereal and sauces, the average ChatGPT user is currently faced with an overabundance.

item.title: Stratom awarded Navy contract for autonomous refueling system
item.description: Stratom's new system, DORI, will allow Navy uncrewed surface vehicles to refuel autonomously at sea. The post Stratom awarded Navy contract for autono...

item.title: Crowdstrike’s massive cyber outage 1-year later: lessons enterprises can learn to improve security
item.description: The incident's legacy extends far beyond CrowdStrike. Organizations now implement staged rollouts and maintain manual override capabilities.

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: Weaving reality or warping it? The personalization trap in AI systems
item.description: Each of our versions of reality is changing with AI. This could erode our ability to agree on basic facts or navigate shared challenges.
